highSpecificity.selector:
.ripple::after,
  .magnetic,
  .icon-rotate,
  .icon-rotate-reverse,
  .icon-spin-hover:hover .icon,
  .bounce-hover,
  .underline-animated::after,
  .card-flip-inner,
  .progress-ring-circle,
  .counter-animated.counting,
  .glow-pulse,
  .shimmer-effect::before,
  .morph-icon,
  .elastic-button,
  .scale-hover,
  .rotate-hover,
  .fade-scale-hover,
  .slide-up-reveal::after,
  .pulse-border::before,
  .shake-hover,
  .float-animation,
  .typing-effect,
  .wave-effect::before,
  .wave-effect::after,
  .spotlight-effect::before,
  .gradient-shift,
  .tilt-3d
